attributes.action: Free school meals for children in Primary and Secondary school.
attributes.additional_details: We need our next generation to have the best start in life. We are all feeling the pinch and why should children go hingry because of greedy energy compaines. Children dont deserve to suffer at the hands of all of this.
attributes.background: As parents the cost of living is crippling us. We shouldn't have to make these choices of feeding our children or heating. All children in education under the age of 16 should get free school meals. No matter if thier parents are on benefits or not. Its a legal requirement for them to attend school.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617633
